website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive alternative to Urban Decay's iconic primer, this also lasts all day without creasing.
pros: This primer holds eyeshadow extremely well while accentuating the color
It goes on smoothly with a creamy texture
cons: The beige and nude tone doesn't tend to work as well for dark complexions

customer_reviews.title: You may think that you are fine just putting face primer on your eyes. You would be wrong.
customer_reviews.text: 1. The color of the primer: it is a tan/beige color. I am a dark skinned Black woman so it does not blend perfectly into my skin. If I put too much primer on without covering it in eyeshadow, when it dries my eyelids look ashy. 2. Application of the primer: I apply it with my fingers and let it dry a bit before I put on my eyeshadow. 3. How it works: Awesome. Eyeshadow colors show up much more vibrant and really help stay on throughout the day. It has become a mainstay of my makeup routine.
customer_reviews.author: Broke And Bougie

customer_reviews.title: the color payoff for the eyeshadow is better, and it stays on all day but also ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would a lower priced alternative to Urban Decay Primer. This stuff works just as well as higher priced products, the color payoff for the eyeshadow is better, and it stays on all day but also is easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to spend a ton on make up but I do enjoy it. I don't have high end eyeshadows but enjoy cheaper (yet good quality) ones like the revealed 2 coastal scents palette. Since using this primer, the application of the eyeshadows has improved exponentially. The colors are more vibrant, they "stick" to the primer perfectly, it helps to keep my shadow in place (no colors blending into one hot mess) and it prevents creasing. I wear make up for most of the day (7am-7pm) and this makes my eyeshadows look fawless from the moment I leave the house until I'm ready to take my make up off.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Sue

customer_reviews.title: I love how it goes on so smoothly and it really ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help keep my eyeshadow from creasing during the day. I love how it goes on so smoothly and it really makes the colors in my shadows more vibrant. It also keeps my shadow from disappearing by the end of the day. I still see a little creasing, but only after wearing makeup from morning to night. The texture is creamy, light and blends easily. Overall, I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Dry and flakey eyelids
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of a previous eyeshadow primer I had and didn’t want to spend a ton of money to replace it. I found this one and it had good reviews so I decided to give it a try. I’ve been using it since late June and I feel like I have a good sense now if the product works for me or not...which it doesn’t. I didn’t even know my eyelids can get dry and flakey until using this. Even before putting this on my eye lid skin is like peeling and dry af. I’m going to have to throw this out and not wear makeup for awhile while i heavily moisturize my lids to repair the skin there.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Exellent formula
customer_reviews.text: I loved what a difference this primer made! The shadow fallout was reduced to nil, the colors were amplified by almost half, and it doesn't rub off easily. You only need a small amount, and the formula is non-greasy, non-staining, non-scented (and I am very sensitive to scents), and non-sticky. It is a great value for the price as well (the tube is actually full). It blends well and doesn't tint the skin. I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Neya

customer_reviews.title: Burned my eyelids, couldn't use.
customer_reviews.text: I put it on and then it felt like I had put mint or camphor on my lids, they began to burn. I had put eyeshadow over after setting for a short while and it continued to burn so I had to remove. I tried again and it burned. I had my sister try and she didn't get that sensation. I think they need to reformulate it, many others have reported the same burning and some felt they had chemical burns by way of drying or redness. I didn't leave it long enough. I can't use it, so it's useless to me. Waste of money at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Taste

customer_reviews.title: Just Purchased my Second Tube
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and have tried a number of eye shadow primers. I admit I tried this one because of the lower price since I have "wasted" too much money on this type of product. The Milani Primer is fantastic! Along with applying to my eyelid for my eye shadow I put some right under my bottom lashes and my eyeliner lasts, finally! I just purchased my second tube of this and have recommended to friends on Facebook also. I work full time outside of the home and dress for work everyday and this products allows my eye products to last also!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S Conder

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try out this eyeshadow primer from Milani but sad to say I had to throw it away. As soon as I put it on my eyelid it started feel like my eyelids were on fire. Had to remove it right away with makeup remover wipes. Never using this product again. I have sensitive skin but have used other Milani products before and they’ve worked fine on my skin so I think it’s weird that an eyeshadow primer of theirs would give me this type of reaction. Anyways just FYI for those of you who may have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Yudi E.

customer_reviews.title: Crumbled on my eyelids :(
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an eyeshadow primer for my sensitive eyes. Some eye shadows, primers, eyeliners make my eyes water or burn. This one crumbled on my eyelids and went into my eye which of course irritate them. It may work for most but not me.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble with eye shadows all my life. I don't know why it took me so long to get a primer. Maybe because I didn't know they existed? I took a class at a make up retail store, where the eye make-up palette had a primer. But it was really pricey and I already owned a lot of eye shadow, some unused. I decided to see what I could find on Amazon and stumbled upon this. It's wonderful. Who knew that I could dab this on, put on eye shadow, and by the end of the day, still have it on? Maybe y'all knew this all along and I'm the last to know...but I know now.
customer_reviews.author: butcept

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a waitress, I work near a lot of heat, I’m moving around a lot, and to top it off, and I have oily lids. This product not only works better than all of the other high end concealers and primers I’ve used before (Josie Maran’s Vibrancy concealer, Tatcha’s Silk primer) but it helps my eyeshadow stay intact and vibrant for more than 12 hours. And it’s only $5! I’m never going back, thanks Milani!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's terrible!
customer_reviews.text: What a product for sensitive eye lids! All you need to know is that it is like trying to spread TOOTHPASTE on to your eye lids. I couldn't wipe it off (the little bit I put on) with my finger. Had to use a wash cloth with soap to remove it. Still want it?
customer_reviews.author: Gail Eanes

customer_reviews.title: Great product for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This primer is great. I have very oily skin, including my eyelids, and my eye shadow, eyeliner, mascara, anything I put on my eyes would smudge after a few hours, or as soon as I go outside in the summer. When I use this primer all of my eye makeup stays in place ALL day. It's very easy to apply and I follow the instructions of waiting 30 seconds after application to apply any makeup. I use this even if I'm only putting on mascara because it keeps it from creating little black dots on my upper eye lids!
customer_reviews.author: Renee E. Shenk

customer_reviews.title: It is great in color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item just to try instead of spending a lot on my usual Urban Decay eye primer. I am actually quite impressed with this eye primer. It is great in color. Goes on smooth, lasts a long time (especially if you are using a finishing/setting spray or powder). My word of advice is to put it on and smooth out with either a liquid foundation brush or a concealer brush and let it dry for a good two minutes before applying any eye shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Kept eyeshadow crease free. Feels stiff to the touch.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience with an eyeshadow primer. I wanted something to keep my eyeshadow from creasing throughout the day. It definitely helped in that case (I was pleasantly surprised) but I didn’t love that I could feel it to the touch on my eyelid. It felt stiff when I would touch it, but was not noticeable otherwise. This may be normal and wouldn’t necessarily deter my from using. It did what it’s supposed to do but I wish it felt softer once applied/dry.
customer_reviews.author: Diy-er123

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive stuff!
customer_reviews.text: So confession, I bought this in 2017. And just finished it.. but only because I have a subscription to a few beauty boxes that send samples, & tried other more expensive brands, but this is by far my favorite. It isn't greasy like some others, plus it offers a bit of concealer like properties that I appreciate. I use it on my eyelids & under my eyes to keep everything in it's place. Trust me, for the price, you can't go wrong, & will be surprised how well this inexpensive little gem works!
customer_reviews.author: B.Slater

customer_reviews.title: Makes your eyeshadow last all day! Love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product! I have oily eyelids and have to have eye shadow primer to use eyeshadow. I have used many brands, including urban decay, which is much more expensive, and this is definitely just as good as anything I have used. It keeps my eyeshadow on ALL day. It’s such a good price and one tube lasts such a long time
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Great staying power
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a higher end product for years but was never 100% happy with its staying power. I tried this brand because I like some of their other products and it was a good price. I really like it! It goes on smoothly and really seems to help my eye makeup stay put, which is a challenge, as I have very oily eyelids. It comes off easily when I need it to. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NovaKay

customer_reviews.title: Niece lives this primer.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 16 year old niece. Been teaching her little by little about makeup since she was 12. Ordered this for her when she asked me how do I make my eye makeup last. This is a very good eye primer. She used it and she loves it!!! Will order more of this for her and the price is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Helen E. T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: This is good not great. At first I thought great but after wearing it for a while and really paying attention I can say with a heavy heart.. it's not terrible. I wear bold eyeshadow and after about 6hrs was getting the tiger eye. I think if you are a light shadow person this would be great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bethrawks

customer_reviews.title: It's an okay product
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with some of my favorite skin softener and when you get the right consistently, it goes on well. My eyelids are not as tough as they use to be and I have sensitive skin. Since the China coronavirus I haven't been using makeup like I used to. So can't tell you how long it would last pin an average tube. Sorry...
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: it is not my favorite. I bought this one specifically for my daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several eye primers, while I do reach for the Milani one quite a bit, it is not my favorite. I bought this one specifically for my daughters competitive dance state make-up. It causes the pigments to clump up and get patchy, yes the primer has thoroughly dried before pigment is applied. We have tried other brands of eye primer with better results. If you are using with drug store eye shadows it seems to do better, it is just loose pigments that we had issues with. It is a great formula, and price is good.
customer_reviews.author: KKzcar

customer_reviews.title: Ehh..
customer_reviews.text: I love Milani products but this didn't cut it for me unfortunately. For the price, quality, and amount of product you get the nyx one works better and gives you more for your money. It keeps the eye shadow on but not as well as my go to NYX one does. It has a weird consistency, but it is easy to apply. I was disappointed with the amount of product you get...Blend quickly because it does dry somewhat quickly. It does it's job but I have had better eye shadow primers and will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Creamy soft coverage!
customer_reviews.text: This product was new for me. I was looking for a full-face primer but since I focus on my best feature, my eyes, I was excited to try this one. It was easy to apply and you only need a tiny dot for each eye. I highly recommend this product! Be beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I have used mac paint pot in painterly and the urban decay eye primer, and this is much, much better for my dry eyelids. I found that my eyeshadow went on less patchy than with the paint pot, and there wasn't any visible creasing. My shadows stayed on more vivid. The only downside is that it does not do a lot in the way of covering up discoloration on eyelids. This isn't a huge problem for me, but I imagine putting a touch of foundation down first would solve this problem. I'll be recommending this to anyone I know with dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Worst eyeshadow primer I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why this has such great reviews! After applying it, I was horrified to see my lids dry up and the primer begin to flake off. I tried a few different ways of applying it and ended up with the same awful result. Finally tossed it. Complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlette

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but great product. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived SUPER fast, love the product. Its thick enough to not waste too much product when you squeeze it, thin enough to go on smoothly. Feels like velvet, makes my eye lids feel buttery smooth. I haven't used it with high pigment eye shadow yet, so cant tell if it intensifies it like it says it does, but it does keep my regular shadow on all day, no creases. Will buy it again once it runs out, which should be a long time, a little seems to go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: I get the hype.
customer_reviews.text: I get what everybody is talking about. It works. While it is worth the money, and it does what it says it does, I don't care for it. I personally need a bit of coverage where this is sheer. This is indeed matte and it does keep shadows in place and from creasing on my oily lids. However, I didn't care for the textured consistency of the product itself. I prefer something smooth and easier to apply to the lid. Please don't shoot the messenger :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Fodelmesi

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the BEST! On the rare occasion that I don't remove my makeup before bed...eyeshadow is still perfectly intact in the morning!! Longevity for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Gourley

customer_reviews.title: Small amount works wonders last all day!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeshadow primer except just put a very little bit on because if you put too much it takes up your eyelid especially if you’re older and makes it creepy looking I’ve learned this from using it other than that it stays on great and last throughout the day with no creases but if you’re an older woman like I am Early 50s Make sure you watch how much you put on use a very small amount and it will work right
customer_reviews.author: Patti D.

customer_reviews.title: Product works as described
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! It works as described by the seller; I learned to always check out the product reviews prior to purchasing. I started applying this primer to my eyelids prior to applying my eye shadow, and it absolutely helps smooth out the shadow, and prolongs it's stay-on all day. This is my first experience with using eye primer. It really works!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, stays forever
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING eyeshadow primer. It really brings the colors to life and makes it stay ALL DAY LONG. Doesn't irritate my eyes either. I got this recommendation from reddit, and I'm glad I did. It's better than the other high end expensive eye primers and for just a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with oily eyelids
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many eyeliners over the years for my oily eyelids and this primer makes it so that most of the eyeliners that didn't work previously stay really well! I still have issues after a long day where I sweat, but on a normal day this works fantastically!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well for the price and is a good match no real complaints yet although this is my first time using eyeshadow primer, happy with the purchase, my eyelids tend to get kinda oily throughout the day so this product is awesome to use without any shadow too just to keep them matte and a little more crease free! Lasted all day for me
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: This eyeshadow primer is outstanding in performance and lasts all day. Not heavy at all. However, I developed a itchy, peeling, and burning rash on my eyelids on the 4th day of using. I'm so sad to have to return this and give another primer for sensitive eyes😣
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Caid

customer_reviews.title: Makes eyeshadow more vibrant but doesnt fade well with darker skin tones
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a beauty guru maybe I dont know how to apply it properly but on the bottle it says for all skin tones and PFF ok. It becomes hidden when I put eyeshadow over it but it just makes my eyelids look ashy af; it doesnt fade that well into my skin down but what did I expect. It's a good product it makes my eyeshadow more vibrant but it doesnt blend well with my skintone like I was hoping it would
customer_reviews.author: Natallya

customer_reviews.title: Works well but requires precise application.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works well. Just keep in mind, wherever this stuff ends up, there will be a noticeable difference in the skin that has makeup on it and skin that doesn't. Just try to make sure it's only going on the space you plan to apply eyeshadow. Not anywhere around it.
customer_reviews.author: ambival3nt

customer_reviews.title: Really prevents creasing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this product! I have had a lot of issues with creasing and tried a couple of other items with little success. This cream not only prevents creasing but also brightens my eye shadow. Will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: fishpondgirl

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have super duper oily skin...yes, even my eye lids. Generally, my eye makeup is m.i.a by mid-afternoon. I was stoked to discover my eye shadow was still in tact and looking perfect after 10 long hours. Went to sleep, didn't remove my eye makeup, and it was still there the next morning. Again...i love this stuff, it doesn't disappoint regardless if it's powder, cream, liner, or the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Z

customer_reviews.title: Makeup
customer_reviews.text: Good primer! Wow! With y gel .iner cat eyes this product makes show and liner stay on all day! Love it! Only reason why I gave it a 4 star rating on removel is because it takes a min 2 get all off with your makeup, but that's a good thing. We want it to last long and stay on very well! So good product! Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: snowballz6969

customer_reviews.title: Dried out my eyelids
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for more of a moisture based primer (62 yrs old). Unfortunately it just didn't work for me. Dried out my eyelids. My eyeshadow looked better without this primer.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: Best eye shadow primer!
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time cosmetologist and have used MANY products over the years. I was looking for a long wear eyeshadow primer for me son's upcoming wedding. I purchased few and this one is by far the absolute best. Our salon reopened last week from the shut down and at the end of a long 10 hour day, my eye shadow still had a perfectly matte finish! There was no sign of oiliness, creasing or smudging. I highly recommend this product! I have ordered their face make up primer and can't wait to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Matthews

customer_reviews.title: A lot for a little tube
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much! It does wonders for my eye shadow and keeps it from creasing. I have incredibly oily skin and this product keeps everything in place. I found the eye primer first and now use the face primer as well. I also use the eye primer to really make sure any occasional blemishes are covered, all day. Just let it dry for 30 seconds, apply your powder fairly quickly for the best hold. Then you can put liquids and gels (i.e. eyeliners) on top without any issues. It holds the powders so well! Now you do need to use a thin layer or it looks shabby. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: KayOH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a budget friendly primer that actually WORKS!! I have tried others and was very disappointed and kept going back to UD, which is more expensive but is worth it since it works so well. I saw this reviewed somewhere and decided to take the chance one more time, and I'm glad I did. This works just as well as UD but at a fraction of the price. I will definitely continue to use this and recommend others try it as well.
customer_reviews.author: mrswoody

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but didn't help oily lids
customer_reviews.text: This, unfortunately didn't keep my shadow on. I do have oily eyelids and was hoping that this would help, but it didn't seem to. I didn't notice any irritation from it and it was very easy to use though. It's a good amount for the price so I'd still say it's worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: talijane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: After 11 hours I had hardly a crease! I got water on my face the other day & a drop was sitting on my eyebrow but didn't move: it was like the primer said, "Oh no- you're not coming down here. Not today" :)
customer_reviews.author: J.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily lids
customer_reviews.text: Having oily skin I was looking for a primer to prevent all my eye makeup from melting down and making me look like a zombie-this did the trick! I was skeptical due to the low price and the fact that my skin can be a little fussy, but will definitely continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessketch

customer_reviews.title: Works like expensive primers
customer_reviews.text: This eye primer works really well. I tried to go without primer but once you start you can see the difference right away. A good value that does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Deegan-Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love*
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I completely understand all the hype around this primer. It brightens my eye shadow and last all day plus. It goes on evenly and has a great consistency, not to mention the price is oh so nice. I will continue ordering this Milani primer, for sure. Kristy (on fiance's account)
customer_reviews.author: John ByrneTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: It’s Okay But There Are Better Primers
customer_reviews.text: This is my first eye primer and it’s okay for its price, but it just wasn’t what I was expecting. I really would want a sticky primer but instead it was like slight oily with a creamy feel to it. It doesn’t really last that long and doesn’t want to hold the makeup. The only okay part is it’s easy to remove. Overall I would try to find a primer that’s better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best drugstore dupe!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a high end eye primer for years (Lorac). I have tried other "drugstore dupes" with no success. I have even tried other high end eye primers that didn't work for my very oily eyelids (urban decay). THIS. WORKS. I have permanently made the switch - please don't ever stop making this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gemelaris

customer_reviews.title: No Creases!
customer_reviews.text: I've looked all over my area for this product without success. Was especially pleased to find Amazon carries it. Been using it for about 2 yrs. and am very pleased, otherwise I would have tried something else. Goes on smoothly; absolutely no creases in my eye shadow with this primer. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Map

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This primer is perfect! Right out of the squeeze-tube, the color is a lightly-tanned beige, but rubs down to perfectly match my skin tone at more of a porcelain hue. It is NOT a sticky base, but holds eye shadow in place very well. At the end of the day, I have zero transference from my lid onto the area directly above it. It can also take a minor amount of rubbing without transference to your finger or smudging.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had previously used a more expensive primer and had low expectations but I have to say that this product did better than my fifty dollar one. It lasts the entire work day, goes on easily, and didn’t feel cakey like some of the other cheap brands. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Cool fact: This brand was created in East LA.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using eyeshadow primer. It’s very creamy however, it tends to get a little chunky even though I use just a little bit. But, it definitely dissolves if you keep pressing or gently rubbing it onto your eyelid.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Stays tacky
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd give this a try but it was too tacky and never fully dried, even when I used just the tiniest bit. I'll stick with NYX eyeshadow primer because it works on my eyebrows as well!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Why did it take me so long to buy this?
customer_reviews.text: I have always had oily eyelids, no matter how well I wash my face before attempting to wear makeup. It never failed that any eyeshadow I put on would be a mess within the hour. NOT any more! This stuff kept my shadow firmly in place while the rest of me was a sweaty mess at a festival in 90+ degree heat.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyeshadow Primer
customer_reviews.text: For years I have been using Urban Decay Shadow Primer. I decided to give the MILANI primer a try and was so surprised at how good it is. My shadow lasted all day. Think I will be saving quite a bit of money using this product and will definitely repurchase when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Kendle

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: I learned a little goes a long way and it does not let my oily eyelids make the shadow crease for hours! Normally I’m a creasy mess by hour two but my eye makeup lasted for a good 6-7 hours before it started to crease. I’m very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Cracks up!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a primer so based on the reviews I chose this one. The first time I applied it, I thought I had used too much. Second time, used a lot less and applied it as evenly as possible. Third time, I used a brush. Every single time it creases and dries like glue, therefore I wasn't able to apply the eye shadow on top of it. It didn't sting and I was able to remove it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ana alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Better vibrancy of eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: small tube but should last a long time. I have bought 2 so far. Definitely has made a difference in how my eyes look throughout the day. The vibrancy of the color lasts longer and less smudging happens if I rub my eye during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Langmead

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Milani Primer!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this eye primer for years and I still think it’s better than high end. It works as well as UD and TF but the price is unbeatable. You only need a tiny amount and it lasts forever. Makes eyeshadow pop and last. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MouthyMama

customer_reviews.title: I didn't notice a difference in my eye shadow staying ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice a difference in my eye shadow staying on longer or being more pigmented. It appears to just be concealer that is slightly lighter than what I use on my face and just using your normal concealer as a base for eye shadow works just as well. It did go on really smoothly and blended well, but I found it to be just another tube in my make up drawer not an essential item.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Won’t buy again. Definitely not a “it works as good as the more expensive products”. Not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney R Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Compare to Urban Decay primers
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to the much more expensive Urban Decay primer. This goes on silky and smooth, and my shadow won’t crease even after 12 hours of wear. I will definitely be purchasing this again, it’s a great sub for one of my favorite primers.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: So inexpensive but some of the BEST primer I have used. I love this and will continue to buy it. Makes my eyeshadow "pop" and keeps it on ALL DAY LONG.
customer_reviews.author: DP93

customer_reviews.title: This product burns my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I will not be buying this product again since my eyes burn every time I use it. It sounded good in the description, but I will not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bahama Mama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent primer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great eyeshadow primer! I had struggled with finding a decent primer that doesn't make my shower and/or eyeliner look like crocodile skin and alas! I've found it! Very pleased with this brand and will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Milani Eyeshadow Primer
customer_reviews.text: Works well for eyeshadow primer. A little cakey tho, make sure to put on your hand first, for a smoother texture!👍
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this eyeshadow primer!
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying this from now on cause I have tried others and I have wasted a lot of money until I tried this one. I don’t have the tacky feeling after it dries or clumps from where I applied it with this one it dries smooth and soft and I get the best colors out of my eyeshadow now.
customer_reviews.author: Rose L.

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright ; when putting on the basic but when I tried to make the cut line for like a new layer it didn’t give the results I was looking for but for the basic one layer just to have some eye shadow it was pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: shavon

customer_reviews.title: Primer Performs Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This primer worked very well, my eyeliner and shadow stayed on for 24 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gettig

customer_reviews.title: Stays Put
customer_reviews.text: Monster of a primer! Even after 8 hours of work and a nap on the couch, my eyeshadow looks the same as I applied it in the morning. First primer I've used and I love it, wish I bought it ages ago! I use my finger to apply it evenly over my eyelids, it applies smoothly and dries quickly
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased different eyeshadow primers and this is the only one I can say works for me. Keeps my eye makeup intact for a long time. I'm very impressed with it and once I'm done with the tube I'll be buying more of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaobella

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely great in terms of primer benefits. My shadow stick has never lasted so long. Applies chunky, but can usually rub in chunks with relatively minimal effort. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: TARA

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I am singing this stuff's praises on every street corner! My lids are super oily, so eyeshadow never manages to last more than a couple hours before smudging into a mess. But this primer? Holy longevity, Batman! My shadow stayed exactly where I put it for nearly ten hours and then came right off. Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do anything

customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay. But I’ll probably invest in a better eye primer if you can
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. It does the job for sure. But it’s kinda cakey and leaves marks. Make sure you only put a tiny tiny amount and blend it really good because it will look like a dried up concealer.
customer_reviews.author: The Mom Mess

customer_reviews.title: Eyeshadow looks great and last long
customer_reviews.text: The eyeshadow stays on a lot longer than the one I was previously using. The color does not fade, was very impressed. (FYI, the one I was previous using was an expensive one that totally disappointed me.)
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works great!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite drugstore eye primer! I highly recommend if you wanna save money but have a nice primed eye regardless. It's also cruelty free! So win win.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Eyeshadow Primer
customer_reviews.text: Great primer! I have been using Urban Decay eyeshadow primer for a while, but I had heard good things about Milani's eyeshadow primer and decided to give it a try. I think it works much better, the application is easier, and you can't beat the price. I will be purchasing this again!
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this primer. My eye shadow did not go on smoothly and also creased. Perhaps I needed to apply powder over the primer first. For my mature skin I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: ❤Amazing inexpensive dupe for Urban Decay primer potion!❤
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this eyeshadow primer. It's pretty much a dupe for Urban Decay primer potion. Less is more. You don't need much for it to have super staying power. Stays all day or all night or...... all day AND night! Love, love, LOVE & the price is right! Get it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: RAINA ASTRELLA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, especially for the price!!!! Before this, my eyelid was a greasy mess and all my eyeshadows would get stuck in my crease. Now I prime my eyelids with this product, and then top it with some translucent powder. My eyeshadows last all day, even if I've been sweating at work. Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: kumiko sachs

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeshadow Primer Out There
customer_reviews.text: Eyeshadow primers can get expensive, but this one is just as quality of some of the high end ones without the high end price. It lasts all day and works beautifully. You don't need to use a lot, so it lasts awhile too.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...
customer_reviews.text: And does it great! I used this a few years ago, then tried MANY others. And realized thisnis much better than many on the market. I don't plan on trying any others. Great value, great coverage, and great holding.
customer_reviews.author: ND Mizzi

customer_reviews.title: Store with cap facing up
customer_reviews.text: Store this tube with the cap facing up in a small cup or glass. It separates, and stored cap-down, all you get is liquid when you squeeze it. It is better than not using primer for sure, but I find it just ok. I have not been able to squeeze or shake it enough to stop it from separating.

customer_reviews.title: Love Milani Products but Didn't See Much of a Difference with This Primer

I have really really dry skin and I always have a hard time getting powders to stick, especially to my eyelids. This just might not have been the heavy duty stickiness and moisture that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Star Sweeper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eyeshadow primer
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all brands of eyeshadow primer. This is THE BEST. I wont waste money trying any other brand. A little goes a long way and the shadow looks just applied when I go to take it off!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Prime those eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Glides on smooth. Makes a great improvement for a smooth shadow. Great under chrome! I was truly surprised at how bright my eyes looked. Great find ! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Makes a huge difference! When using with lesser pigmented shadows, this allows you to build easily. When using highly pigmented shadows, your colors really pop with no effort at all.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Primer Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used several different brands of eye primer including more expensive lines found in department stores. After everything I've tried this is the best! I have applied it early in the morning and have removed my eye makeup late that night without a single crease. I do wait a couple of. minutes after applying though as suggested by other reviewers. This is my new go-to eye primer. Also note the reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: MARY M

customer_reviews.title: Very good primer!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this primer. I've always used Bare Minerals shimmery primer but decided I didn't want the shimmer all the time. This one goes on easy and covers a lot of my lil spider veins (not all but a lot!). It also makes the eye shadow color pop a lot more. I'm not a makeup person but I was pleasantly surprised by that. I never reapply my makeup after I put it on so I can't really say if it needs to be reapplied but seems to last a while in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: This primer is great! I used it and it did just what ...
customer_reviews.text: This primer is great! I used it and it did just what I needed it to do. It went on easy and I didn't notice any color once applied. My eye shadow lasted all day and it was very hot and humid here.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Stout

customer_reviews.title: A staple in my makeup routine
customer_reviews.text: Actually keeps my makeup looking good! Still does crease a little bit after a while, but definitely a better option than others. Applying eyeshadow was so smooth and it made it look so vivid.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and lasts a while
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this primer for a while and it does a great job. It lasts a long time and is easy to use and dries quick.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: came on time holds my eyeliner and make in place its just little bit hard take off but over all its pretty good
customer_reviews.author: savannahvilsack
